article_title: North Korea Confirms Purge of Kim Jong Un's Uncle
article_text:
SEOUL—North Korea on Monday confirmed the purge of Jang Song Thaek, the uncle of dictator Kim Jong Un and second-most-influential figure in the regime.

A meeting of top officials of the ruling Workers' Party on Sunday decided to expel Mr. Jang from the...

twitter.description: Jang Song Thaek, a longtime senior figure in the North Korean regime, was reported to have been found guilty of "antiparty, counter-revolutionary factional acts," including disobeying orders issued by leader Kim Jong Un.
twitter.creator: @AlastairGale

image.alt: Kim Jong Un's uncle was removed from power, accused of 'antiparty, counterrevolutionary factional acts'

twitter.title: North Korea Confirms Purge of Kim Jong Un's Uncle
